txt.en: The metal is of poor quality, but it will have to suffice
DNT
You are fated to labour in service to the Dark Lord.
The iron glows and radiates a powerful heat
An inferior design to be certain, but you have done as asked
The blade's edge is sharp, but jagged
Set the finished Orkish blade on a weapon rack at Anghnúl
The honed Orkish blade glows in the darkness of the dungeons
The Orkish blade is finished and needs only to cool on a weapon rack
The Stout-axes are forced to serve as the metalsmiths of the Dark Lord in the dungeons of the Dark Tower.
You are fated to labour in service to the Dark Lord.
Hammer the iron bar into the shape of an Orkish blade
Hone the Orkish blade on a grindstone
Heat the Orkish blade in one of the forges at Anghnúl
Quench and temper the blade in a tub at Anghnúl
Collect crude iron bars at Anghnúl, the Forge of Torment
Crude iron bars can be found at Anghnúl, the Forge of Torment.
Forges can be found at Anghnúl, the Forge of Torment.
Heat the iron bars in one of the forges at Anghnúl
Anvils can be found at Anghnúl, the Forge of Torment.
Grindstones can be found at Anghnúl, the Forge of Torment.
Forges can be found at Anghnúl, the Forge of Torment.
You place the Orkish blade onto a weapon rack
A tub can be found at Anghnúl, the Forge of Torment.
A rack can be found at Anghnúl, the Forge of Torment.
Preparations for War
